4 AvoidanceControl::AvoidanceControl()
5 {
6  cout << "Initializing class variables" << endl;
7 
8  Eigen::VectorXd jointLimitsMin{7}, jointLimitsMax{7}, jointVelocityMax{7};
9  jointLimitsMin << -2.8973, -1.7628, -2.8973, -3.0718, -2.8973, -0.0175, -2.8973;
10  jointLimitsMax << +2.8973, +1.7628, +2.8973, -0.0698, +2.8973, +3.7525, +2.8973;
11  jointVelocityMax << 2.1750, 2.1750, 2.1750 , 2.1750, 2.6100 , 2.6100 , 2.6100;
12 
13  jointMiddleValues = 0.5 * (jointLimitsMax + jointLimitsMin);
14  jointRanges = jointLimitsMax - jointLimitsMin;
15 
16  desired_position << 0.3, -0.5, 0.5;
17  start_position << 0.3, 0.5, 0.5;
18  obstacle_position << 0.3, -0.2, 0.5;
19 
20  q.resize(7);
21 
22  cout << "Initializing subscribers" << endl;
23 
24  distanceSubscriber = nh.subscribe("/proximity_data1", 10, &AvoidanceControl::distanceCallBack, this);
25  jointStateSubscriber = nh.subscribe("/joint_states", 10, &AvoidanceControl::jointStateCallback, this);
26  distancePublisher = nh.advertise<sensor_msgs::Range>("/proximity_data1", 10);
27  startPublisher = nh.advertise<std_msgs::Bool>("/at_start_position", 10);
28 
29  cout << "Start reading EndEffectorPosition" << endl;
30 
31  readEndEffectorPosition();
32 }

38 void AvoidanceControl::distanceCallBack(const sensor_msgs::Range::ConstPtr& msg)
39 {
40  distance.header = msg->header;
41  distance.radiation_type = msg->radiation_type;
42  distance.field_of_view = msg->field_of_view;
43  distance.min_range = msg->min_range;
44  distance.max_range = msg->max_range;
45  distance.range = msg->range;

49 void AvoidanceControl::jointStateCallback(const sensor_msgs::JointState::ConstPtr& msg)
50 {
51  if (isSim == true)
52  q << msg->position[2], msg->position[3], msg->position[4], msg->position[5], msg->position[6], msg->position[7], msg->position[8];
53  else
54  q << msg->position[2-2], msg->position[3-2], msg->position[4-2], msg->position[5-2], msg->position[6-2], msg->position[7-2], msg->position[8-2];
55 }

58 void AvoidanceControl::readEndEffectorPosition()
59 {
60  while (ros::ok())
61  {
62  try
63  {
64  transform_listener.lookupTransform("/world", "/panda_link8",
65  ros::Time(0), transform);
66  endEffectorPositionVector << transform.getOrigin().getX(),
67  transform.getOrigin().getY(),
68  transform.getOrigin().getZ();
69 
70  // Eigen::Vector3d distanceVector = obstacle_position - endEffectorPositionVector;
71  // publishDistance.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
72  // if (atStartingPoint == true)
73  // {
74  // publishDistance.range = distanceVector.norm();
75  // } else {
76  // publishDistance.range = 100000;
77  // }
78  // distancePublisher.publish(publishDistance);
79  break;
80  }
81  catch (tf::TransformException ex)
82  {
83  ros::Duration(0.3).sleep();
84  }
85  }
86 }

88 
89 Eigen::VectorXd AvoidanceControl::EEVelocityToQDot(Eigen::Vector3d desiredEEVelocity)
90 {
91  Eigen::MatrixXd J = kdlSolver.computeJacobian(std::string("panda_EE"), q);
92  J = J.block(0, 0, 3, 7);
93  Eigen::MatrixXd Jpinv = J.completeOrthogonalDecomposition().pseudoInverse();
94  Eigen::VectorXd secondaryTaskFunctionGradient = 2.0/7.0 * (q - jointMiddleValues).cwiseQuotient(jointRanges);
95  return Jpinv * desiredEEVelocity - secondaryTaskGain * ((Eigen::MatrixXd::Identity(7, 7) - Jpinv*J) * secondaryTaskFunctionGradient);
96 }
97 
98 
99 void AvoidanceControl::moveToPosition(const Eigen::Vector3d desiredPositionVector)
100 {
101  positionErrorVector = desiredPositionVector - endEffectorPositionVector;
102 
103  while (positionErrorVector.norm() > position_error_threshold && ros::ok()) {
104 
105  readEndEffectorPosition();
106 
107  positionErrorVector = desiredPositionVector - endEffectorPositionVector;
108  desiredEEVelocity = desiredVelocity * positionErrorVector.normalized();
109 
110  Eigen::Vector3d repulsiveErrorVector = -positionErrorVector.normalized();
111  Eigen::Vector3d repulsiveEEVelocity = maxRepulsiveVelocity / (1 + std::exp(6 * (2 * distance.range / 0.4 - 1))) * repulsiveErrorVector;
112 
113  Eigen::Vector3d commandVelocity = desiredEEVelocity + repulsiveEEVelocity;
114 
115  if (atStartingPoint == true)
116  {
117  jointVelocityController.sendVelocities(EEVelocityToQDot(commandVelocity));
118  } else {
119  jointVelocityController.sendVelocities(EEVelocityToQDot(desiredEEVelocity));
120  }
121 
122  ros::spinOnce();
123  rate.sleep();
124  }
125  // If no velocity is sent then the sim will continue at the last velocity sent
126  if (isSim)
127  {
128  jointVelocityController.sendVelocities(Eigen::VectorXd::Constant(7, 0.0));
129  }
130 }
131 
132 
133 void AvoidanceControl::moveToStart()
134 {
135  ROS_INFO_STREAM("start_position");
136  ROS_INFO_STREAM(start_position);
137  moveToPosition(start_position);
138  atStartingPoint = true;
139  std_msgs::Bool startMsg;
140  startMsg.data = true;
141  startPublisher.publish(startMsg);
142 }
143 
144 
145 void AvoidanceControl::moveToGoal()
146 {
147  moveToPosition(desired_position);
148 }
149 
150 
151 int main(int argc, char **argv)
152 {
153  ros::init(argc, argv, "AvoidanceControl");
154  cout << "spawning AvoidanceControl Object" << endl;
155  AvoidanceControl controller;
156 
157  cout << "Start Moving to a start point" << endl;
158  controller.moveToStart();
159 
160  ros::Duration(5).sleep();
161 
162  cout << "Start Moving to a goal" << endl;
163  controller.moveToGoal();
164 
165  return 0;
166 }
